Description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

Director.Name: Jonathan Demme
Director.Bio: Robert Jonathan Demme was an American director, producer, and screenwriter.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience.

Title: Silence of the Lambs

Description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.

Director.Name: Ryan Coogler
Director.Bio: Ryan Coogler was born on May 23, 1986 in Oakland, California, USA as Ryan Kyle Coogler.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Action film is a film genre in which the protagonist or protagonists are thrust into a series of events that typically include violence, extended fighting, physical feats, and frantic chases.

Title: Black Panther

Description: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

Director.Name: Jon Favreau
Director.Bio: Favreau has progressed to strong mainstream visibility into the millennium and, after nearly two decades in the business.

Description: The Incredibles hero family takes on a new mission, which involves a change in family roles: Bob Parr (Mr Incredible) must manage the house while his wife Helen (Elastigirl) goes out to save the world.

Director.Name: Brad Bird
Director.Bio: Bird is an American director, screenwriter, animator, producer and occasional voice actor, known for both animated and live-action films.

Genre.Name: Animation
Genre.Description: Animated Films are ones in which individual drawings, paintings, or illustrations are photographed frame by frame.

Title: Incredibles 2

Description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

Director.Name: John Krasinski
Director.Bio: Krasinski is known for his role as sardonic nice guy Jim Halpert on the popular TV show The Office.

Genre.Name: Horror
Genre.Description: A horror film is a film that seeks to elicit fear for entertainment purposes.

Title: A Quiet Place

Description: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

Director.Name: Bradley Cooper
Director.Bio: While still in school, Bradley began his professional career, appearing opposite Sarah Jessica Parker on Sex and the City.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Drama Films are serious presentations or stories with settings or life situations.

Title: A Star Is Born

Description: In early 18th century England, a frail Queen Anne occupies the throne and her close friend, Lady Sarah, governs the country in her stead.

Director.Name: Yorgos Lanthimos
Director.Bio: Lanthimos was born in Athens, Greece. He studied directing for Film and Television at the Stavrakos Film School in Athens.

Genre.Name: Biography
Genre.Description: A film that dramatizes the life of a non-fictional or historically-based person or people.

Title: The Favourite

Description: When the creator of a virtual reality called the OASIS dies, he makes a posthumous challenge to all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune and control of his world.

Director.Name: Steven Spielberg
Director.Bio: One of the most influential personalities in the history of cinema, Steven Spielberg is Hollywood's best known director and one of the wealthiest filmmakers in the world.

Genre.Name: Scifi
Genre.Description: Science fiction film is a genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science.

Title: Ready Player One

Description: During an adventure into the criminal underworld, Han Solo meets his future co-pilot Chewbacca and encounters Lando Calrissian years before joining the Rebellion.
